name: Because Badguyz
description:
A game made for Weekly Game Jam #150 in under 6 days by two novice baboons.

Originally intended to be a take on tower defense games, time constraints required us to scale back our scope to this beautiful, hot pile of garbage you can now play from your very own home!

Experience riveting click-based gameplay brought to life with multiple colored pixels.

Bathe yourself in the soundscapes of our OST featuring hits like "BGMusic WGJ150" and "WagonMoveSFX" as well as numerous samples of fart sounds.
